channel.title: Where is moparscape client?
channel.description:
some ppl told me that i need to go to moparscape client at the top and ad the name or w\e can soemone help me? this is what he said....
(right click on my name on hamachi and click copy adress then copy into other moparscape client)
then he said...
(the click at the top of the file new server then copy adress in there and then click enter and type username and pass)
can any of you please help me?
